name: religion or worldview
simple: [SUBJ_LABEL] is affiliated with the religion called [OBJ_LABEL].
compound: [OBJ_LABEL] is a religion or a worldview and [SUBJ_LABEL] is affiliated with it.
complex: [SUBJ_LABEL] is affiliated with [OBJ_LABEL] which is a religion or a worldview.
compound-complex: Many people are associated with a religion or a worldview and [SUBJ_LABEL] is affiliated with one of these, which is [OBJ_LABEL] specifically.
